plugin.name: App Availability Whitelist
plugin.author: Nguyen Tran (https://nguyentr.com/)
plugin.description: Cordova / PhoneGap Plugin to add white-list to the Info.plist file to bypass AppAvailability on the iOS 9.2 changes
plugin.keywords: cordova, ios, app, security, transport, http, https, ats, ssl, tls, appavailability
